messages.subject: Dads / conference

messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I am really getting excited reading about this conference. I just
enrolled my husband and son (of course myself) since it's the same
price even if my husband decides not to. I decided I would like to
make a mini- family vacation out of it. Of course he knows I wanted
to go but doesn't have any idea that I signed him up also LOL.......
I also signed up for the whale watch. I wonder if another adult can
take my husbands spot on the whale watch if he really needs to work
or doesn't want to go ?????????
When I read that it was in SC the last couple of years I figured I
should probably jump @ the chance.
See you all there
Sonya
Attleboro, Mass.
